query.statement: insert into USERS ( USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, SSN, SL_YN, BIRTH_DAY, AGE, CELL_PHONE, ADDR, EMAIL, EMAIL_YN, IMAGE_FILE, REG_DATE ) values ( :userId, :userName, :password, :ssn, :slYn, :birthDay, :age, :cellPhone, :addr, :email, :emailYn, :imageFile, :regDate )

update USERS SET USER_NAME= :userName, PASSWORD= :password, SSN= :ssn, SL_YN= :slYn, BIRTH_DAY= :birthDay, AGE= :age, CELL_PHONE= :cellPhone, ADDR= :addr, EMAIL= :email, EMAIL_YN= :emailYn, IMAGE_FILE= :imageFile, REG_DATE= :regDate where USER_ID= :userId
select USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, SSN, SL_YN, BIRTH_DAY, AGE, CELL_PHONE, ADDR, EMAIL, EMAIL_YN, IMAGE_FILE, REG_DATE from USERS where USER_ID = :userId
